text:
Having defeated the Baron and placed his violet orb on the pedestal,
you step into the portal. Powerful magic sends a tingle over your body.
^
Your body is transported with a white flash.^ You arrive outside the
Hamlet mines and watch the cursed blackness peel away from the land.
Warm sunlight flows over the countryside. As the doors of the mine open wide,
the people run into the streets, acclimating to their freedom.
^
You rush to nearby buildings, looking for a place to hide and figure out your
next move. There are too many humans here for your liking.
^
You break your way into what appears to be an inn. You spend the night under
the sheets of a comfortable bed while the sounds of revelry surround you.
^
As humans party through the hostel, you hear of a power even greater
than Herx's, said to be held in the Magician's Guild...
^
A trapdoor in the bunkroom leads to a sewer.
You wait for the humans to leave...
